type.description: The type of warning prompt. 2.41.0 Added normal type
type.description_zh: 警告提示的类型。2.41.0 新增 normal 类型

show-icon.description: Whether or not to display icons

closable.description: Whether or not to display a close button

title.description: The title of the warning prompt

banner.description: Whether to use as a top announcement (remove borders and rounded corners)
banner.description_zh: 是否作为顶部公告使用（去除边框和圆角）

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the close button is clicked

events.name: after-close
events.description: Turn off trigger after the animation ends
